channel.title: Simulation on Layer9
channel.description: Recent content in Simulation on Layer9

item.title: Cisco and Huawei simulated routers
item.description: Some time ago, I needed to simulate a heterogeneous network, with a Cisco router connected to another Huawei router. It wasn’t easy because IOS is not publicly available and the Huawei simulator, eNSP, is discontinued and only works on VirtualBox 5. To make this simulation, a CPU that supports VM nesting (Second-Level Address Translation - SLAT) is required. Simulation VM Create a Windows 7-based VM, with 4GB of RAM, 2 vCPUS and 4 network interfaces.
